ape rate maha marga paddathiya thula siduwana wiwidha rathawahana waradi handuna ganimin eeta nithiya kriyathmaka kirima sandaha aar.ef.ayi.di. thakshanaya handunwadimata motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwa katayuthu kara thibenawa.me magin maha marga thadabadaya gana thirana ganimata ha eya kalamanakaranaya kirimatada hakiyawa labenu athi bawayi sandahan wanne.

yameku mithya drushtin pilikew karanawa yayi kiya sinhala jathiya ha bandunu yamak weda eewa pamanak wenwa gena eewa mithyadrushtin yayi kiya thadi bamin anith boho mithyya drushtin wala asarana anugamikayan wima apa wataha gatha yuththe keseda?me siyalu anugamikayan ese karanne sinhala jathiya nasime ekama aramunen yayi apa chodana nokaramu.namuth apa me desa wada wicharashiliwa baliya yuthuya.mithya dushtiya wadana iganwim uganwana nisa apa ape daruwan pasal noya sitinne natha.ese nam me samahara gurukulawala dharma kathikayananwahansela athulu boho dena apage bauddha diwi pawathma ha sabandunu sanskruthikangawalata pamanak thoragena pahara denne, prathikshepa karanne ayi?meyin ki denek uthsawa awasthawaladi ‘loku’ hotalyakata giya wita buduradun aahara walandu lesa athin kama kamata lajja weda?ee lajjawa athi wanne samma drushtiya nisada?mewa paragathibawa namathi itha anartha mithyadrushtin nisa athi wana lajjawan noweda?
